airtableAgent.label: Airtable Agent
airtableAgent.description: Agent used to answer queries on Airtable table

baseId.label: Base Id
baseId.description: If your table URL looks like: https://airtable.com/app11RobdGoX0YNsC/tblJdmvbrgizbYICO/viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee, app11RovdGoX0YNsC is the base id

tableId.label: Table Id
tableId.description: If your table URL looks like: https://airtable.com/app11RobdGoX0YNsC/tblJdmvbrgizbYICO/viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee, tblJdmvbrgizbYICO is the table id

returnAll.label: Return All
returnAll.description: If all results should be returned or only up to a given limit

inputModeration.label: Input Moderation
inputModeration.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
